summary: This is an internal FBI email from July 9, 2019, notifying recipients that the New York VCAC squad has converted the Jeffrey Epstein case into a 'crisis case' to aid in information management and has established a national tipline. The email also mentions IA is assisting with Sentinel workflows.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email is about the management of the criminal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Case Converted to Crisis Case
events.description: The FBI's New York VCAC squad (C-20) converted the Jeffrey Epstein case (31E-NY-3027571) to a 'crisis case' to aid in information management and established a national tipline.

keyFacts: The FBI's New York VCAC squad (C-20) converted the Jeffrey Epstein investigation (case number 31E-NY-3027571) into a 'crisis case' on July 9, 2019.
A national tipline was established as part of this crisis case management.
The FBI's Inspection Division (IA) was assisting the squad in establishing roles and workflows in the Sentinel case management system.
The email indicates a significant escalation and formalization of the FBI's investigative response to the Epstein case in mid-2019.
